titleStmt.title: Act of maintenance. At Edinburgh, the third day of February, the yeer of God one thousand six hundred and fourty nine yeers.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Settling the sums to be paid monthly by the shires and burghs to Sir James Stewart, Provost of Edinburgh. The Sheriffdom of Argyle excused one month and Bute half a month. Inverness excused as by Act, 5 January 1647 -- Cf. Steele.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "1648"; 9 in imprint date crossed through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
